title: DOL's Lu on Jobs: Good Report, But Unemployment a Focus (Audio)

description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Chris Lu, Deputy Secretary at the Department of Labor, on the July jobs report. `
